alert.note: Alert for Chase; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Perkins and Chase Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 645 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamar, or 16 miles west of Imperial, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Lamar, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Champion, Crete, Chase, Center Dam Campground, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area, Area A Campground and Church Grove Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 29 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
